com.acmetelecom

Interface IBillGenerator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HtmlBillGenerator

    public interface IBillGenerator
    The BillGenerator interface which all bill generators should implement.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Bill sendBill(com.acmetelecom.customer.Customer customer, java.util.List<LineItem> items, java.lang.String totalBill)
      Generates the specified bill and prints it out.

    • Method Detail

      • sendBill

        Bill sendBill(com.acmetelecom.customer.Customer customer,
            java.util.List<LineItem> items,
            java.lang.String totalBill)
        Generates the specified bill and prints it out.
        Parameters:
        customer - The customer to generate the bill for.
        items - The list of items to put in the bill.
        totalBill - The total bill charge.
        Returns:
        The generated bill.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If any of arguments are null.
